advancements.mob_friends.root.title: Mob Friends
advancements.mob_friends.friendship.zomb: You have gained the recognition of the zombies, they will no longer actively attack you.
advancements.mob_friends.friendship.skel: You have gained the recognition of the skeletons, they will no longer actively attack you.
advancements.mob_friends.friendship.cree: You have gained the recognition of the creepers, they will no longer actively attack you.
advancements.mob_friends.friendship.blaz: You have gained the recognition of the blazes, they will no longer actively attack you.
advancements.mob_friends.friendship.slim: You have gained the recognition of the slimes, they will no longer actively attack you.
advancements.mob_friends.friendship.ende: You have gained the recognition of the endermen, they will no longer actively attack you.
tooltip.mob_friends.broken_zombie_core_r: Use with a Totem of Undying in off-hand to revive.
